idea:
1) To provide a range of products, services and related technologies and devices of engineering consultants, process control instrumentation, Automation, solutions , industrial equipments, electrical and electronics, Controls Systems, Systems integrator, IT & IOT, semiconductors and act as manufacturers, traders, Exporter and Services provider of electronics instruments, Sensors, industrial equipments, devices, tools, and services for HVAC, BMS, IBMS, Cleanrooms, cold chains, IOT and IT software and hardware etc. for measuring, controlling ,monitoring , Automation, test and validation systems i.e. Levels sensors, temperature sensors, pressure sensors, flow sensors, water quality sensors, air quality sensors ,valves, accessories, embedded in detailed engineering services like design, consulting and contracting, Test and Validation, Engineering process services, sourcing support, maintenance, sustenance and after sales Support, Mechanicals, chemicals, Electrical and Electronic, IT hardware and software, robotics, appliances, technical publications, engineering and asset information management.

2) To be engaged in manufacturing and providing related technical services to companies in Pharmaceuticals, Petrochemical, Wastewater treatment facilities, biotech and pharmaceutical labs, medical applications, semiconductor facilities, refineries, power generation plants, food and beverage processing plants, pulp and paper mills, OEM, IT, Chemical manufacturing plants and the host of support companies that serve these industries etc. in India and worldwide
